targets.query: SELECT last("derived_optics_type") FROM "gNMI-Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:/optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SrcIpAddress$/ AND "name" =~ /^$OpticsPortNumber$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s)  * 8 FROM "autogen"."cisco_port_ethernet_statistics_float" WHERE ("interface_name"::tag =~ /^$EthernetPortName$/ AND "source"::tag =~ /^$SrcIpAddress$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s)  * 8 FROM "autogen"."cisco_port_ethernet_statistics_float" WHERE ("interface_name"::tag =~ /^$EthernetPortName$/ AND "source"::tag =~ /^$SrcIpAddress$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source" fill(null)

SELECT last("derived_optics_type") FROM "gNMI-Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:/optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SrcIpAddress$/ AND "name" =~ /^$OpticsPortNumber$/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT mean("dwdm_carrier_frequency") FROM "gNMI-Float-Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:/optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SrcIpAddress$/ AND "name" =~ /^$OpticsPortNumber$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "source" fill(null)

panels.title: OpenZR+ Optical Power Levels in dBm

panels.description: BER values below 0.01 are healthy, between 0.01-0.02 indicates need for maintenance, and above 0.02 indicates likeliness of transport packet loss.
panels.title: Bit Error Rates

targets.query: SELECT mean("snr") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" = '8201') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source", "name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("snr") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" = '8201') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source", "name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("snr") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" = '8201') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source", "name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("snr") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" = '8201') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source", "name" fill(null)
